mapper.select: SELECT R.RECORD_ID AS recordId, R.AMOUNT AS amount,R.PAYEE AS payee,R.PAYEE_TIME AS payeeTime, (SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=R.PAYEE) AS payeeUserName, (SELECT TEMP.TITLE FROM CONTRACT TEMP WHERE TEMP.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND TEMP.CONTRACT_ID=C.CONTRACT_ID) AS title FROM CONTRACT_RECEIVABLES_RECORD R LEFT JOIN CONTRACT_RECEIVABLES C ON R.ORG_ID=C.ORG_ID AND R.RECEIVABLES_ID=C.RECEIVABLES_ID WHERE R.ORG_ID=#{orgId} ORDER BY R.PAYEE_TIME DESC LIMIT 0,10
